items.sentence: Tom told me that he would like me to come over tomorrow afternoon.
Tom was really glad to hear that Mary wanted to come to his party.
Tom\'s new shirt shrunk when he washed it and now it doesn\'t fit.
Tom doesn\'t have any trouble making himself understood in French.
Tom explained to Mary why it wasn\'t advisable for her to do that.
Even though there were many cookies on the dish, I only ate three.
Tom anonymously donated a million dollars to his favorite charity.
Tom tried to look through the keyhole, but couldn\'t see anything.
I\'m glad I wasn\'t the one who had to tell Tom that his dog died.
I\'m interested in that house you\'ve got for rent on Park Street.
